title: Can anyone recommend a reliable repair service for an 820-2915 BGA issue board?
message: I have a customer who wants his 2011 MacBook Pro 15" fixed. I don't mess with this repair but he really wants it fixed so I'm trying to find someone who's doing these successfully. Let me know. Thanks.
